## Chess.clearHeader() method

Removes all PGN header information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearHeader(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```js
chess.setHeader('White', 'Robert James Fischer')
chess.setHeader('Black', 'Mikhail Tal')

```
